answerText: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe[10] The title character of this Goethe novel performs Hamlet as part of a theatrical troupe that includes Felix and Mignon before marrying Natalie and discovering that Felix is his son.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | MIT A + LASA B | 9 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man used the phrase "et in Arcadia ego" to open his travelogue, Italian Journey. For 10 points each: [10] Name this German Romantic author of The Sorrows of Young Werther and Faust.
